  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      The initialize method sets the initial position of the clock hands and starts the clock movements. It is called automatically when the FXML file is loaded.

    • rotateRect

      public static void rotateRect(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rect, double angle)
      The rotateRect method applies a rotation transformation to a Rectangle (clock hand). The rotation is based on the angle calculated for the current time.
      Parameters:
      rect - the Rectangle to rotate
      angle - the angle of rotation (in degrees)
